o: Framework for building Spring applications easily

q: Spring Boot simplifies Spring application development.
The ______ is the core feature of Spring Boot.

o: Automatic bean configuration based on classpath

q: The ______ starter is for building web apps.
YAML and properties files are interchangeable.
The ______ property changes the server port.
What is the default server port?
Spring Boot uses port 8080 by default.
The ______ prepends URL path to all endpoints.

o: Binds app.name and app.timeout to fields
Creates bean only when prod profile is active

q: Spring Boot includes Tomcat by default.
What embedded servers does Spring Boot support?
The ______ is the default embedded server.
The ______ restarts app on classpath changes.
DevTools is disabled in production JARs.
What is the default Actuator base path?

o: Declares method returns a Spring bean

q: The ______ annotation marks bean factory methods.
Constructor injection is the recommended approach.

o: Selects specific bean when multiple exist
Marks preferred bean when multiple exist

q: @Lazy beans are created on first access.
prototype creates new bean each time.
The ______ provides parsed command line arguments.
The ______ enables bean based on property.

o: Creates bean if class is on classpath
Creates bean if no other exists
Order in which properties are resolved

q: my.prop and MY_PROP map to same property.
What is logging in Spring Boot?
The ______ is the default logging framework.
The ______ property sets log file name.
Banner can be image or text.
The ______ option runs without web server.
HealthIndicator reports UP or DOWN status.
The ______ shows current value like memory.
Timer tracks count and total time.
The ______ endpoint is disabled by default.
The ______ runs actuator on different port.
Spring Boot supports Cloud Native Buildpacks.

o: Time to wait for requests to complete

q: HTTP/2 requires HTTPS in most browsers.
The ______ sets Tomcat thread pool size.
What is Spring Boot Gradle plugin?
o: Gradle build support for Spring Boot

q: The ______ task packages Spring Boot app.
Structured logging works with log aggregators.

The ______ links Testcontainer to app config.
BeanPostProcessor runs before and after init.

o: Bean or null if not available

q: @DependsOn ensures other beans are created first.
Constructor injection fails on circular deps.
Circular references are disabled by default in Boot 2.6+.
What prefix gets the FactoryBean itself?
The ______ returns factory instead of product.
AOT generates code at build time.

o: Method injection for prototype in singleton

q: The ______ indicates app is ready for traffic.
The ______ exposes endpoint only via JMX.

o: Conditionally load config based on profile
Multiple configs in one YAML file

q: Spring Cloud Config is for centralized config.

Spring Boot 3 uses Micrometer Observation API.
Distributed tracing correlates logs across services.

o: Unique identifier for a request flow

Thin JARs download dependencies on startup.

o: Keeps JPA session open during request

q: open-in-view is true by default but discouraged.
